name: Themis for Looker
description: A tool for Looker, to find what needs fixing!

SENDGRID_API_KEY.description: A SendGrid API key (find it on https://app.sendgrid.com/settings/api_keys)

THEMIS_EMAIL_RECIPIENTS.description: An email address or list of email address for the users to receive the report

THEMIS_FULL_LOOKML_VALIDATION.description: A True or False value to set the validation all LookML (default is False)

LOOKERSDK_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the Looker instance (if not using the looker.ini file) eg: `https://COMPANY.looker.com:19999`

LOOKERSDK_CLIENT_ID.description: The API3 ID for the API user (https://docs.looker.com/admin-options/settings/users#api3_keys)

LOOKERSDK_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The API3 Secret for the API user (https://docs.looker.com/admin-options/settings/users#api3_keys)
